channel.title: How to make item requirements?
channel.description:
All these new silab items... But I am assuming there is nothing to dictate how much defence you need to equipt dragon boots for example?
I am assuming you would put this in client.java
Could someone give me an example or the actual code to set an item requirement stat like.
if wearing itemid = 7652 (dragon full) check defence <= 60
else " you don't have enough def"
get it? Could someoen help?

item.title: How to make item requirements?
item.dc:creator: @gman035t gman035t
item.description:

All these new silab items… But I am assuming there is nothing to dictate how much defence you need to equipt dragon boots for example?

Could someone give me an example or the actual code to set an item requirement stat like.

get it? Could someoen help?
